title.rendered: Managed Multilingual Real Live Chat Provider & 24/7 Live Chat Outsourcing

[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1492584940134{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1548675568655{margin-bottom: -20px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Our Team

[/vc_column_text]

Real Interact is a managed multilingual real live chat provider and a 24/7 live chat outsourcing company. We specialize in 24/7 chat operations for you and a customized solution. We’ll give you a team that’d handle chats on your behalf 24/7 real live chat. This way you don’t have to worry about talking to every visitor. Instead you just get the qualified leads.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1437207404127{padding-right: 60px !important;}”][vc_tta_tabs style=”modern” shape=”square” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section i_type=”openiconic” add_icon=”true” title=”APPROACH” tab_id=”1440319909313-f99fec7e-56d0″][vc_column_text]

Real Live Chat Provider

Real Interact is a specialized 24/7 managed live chat provider. With our specialized resources located strategically in our offshore facilities, we not only provide multilingual chat, but also a solution where every single visitor is greeted proactively. At Real Interact, we provide a fully bespoke chat solution through a customized training process. Whether you are with the education sector and need live chat for school, colleges and universities or a realtor who needs live chat for a real estate firm. You could be a lawyer looking for live chat for your law firm, a car dealership owner looking for chat for one of your dealerships or an IT guy who wants live chat for real estate or cars marketplace. Whatever your business model is, Real Interact is the company for you. Before going live on your website with our resources, we understand your business model and then train our resources accordingly. So that your prospect customers on your website get professional responses.

 

24/7 Live Chat Outsourcing

Outsourcing via Real Interact enables you to provide support to your website’s visitors via 24/7 human live chat help even for different time zones, making it convenient for you. You can easily convert the leads to sales with the help of 24/7 live chat outsourcing whatever online business it may be. Outsourcing customer support is cost-effective in terms of providing extra office space, paying for support team, contracts and HR.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type=”linecons” i_icon_linecons=”vc_li vc_li-star” add_icon=”true” title=”METHODS” tab_id=”1440319909341-ec943281-3a84″][vc_column_text]Real Interact specializes in managed multilingual chat. We have a large pool of French, Spanish, Chinese, and Arabic resources that could be trained on your business model to cover your website 24/7 and convert your website traffic into leads.
Real Interact specializes in a fully managed multilingual chat solution at the call center level. We can provide resources for any volume and our guarantee is 24/7 coverage and that we greet every single visitor.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

We bring a crafted and inspired approach to every project we work on.

[vc_column_text]

INTERACT WITH EVERY SINGLE VISITOR RIGHT ON YOUR WEBSITE AND DOUBLE YOUR LEADS. Because of so many competitors, 97% of tour website visitors bounce off your website.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”20″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1556128222575{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”dark_bg” el_id=”BUSINESS STRATEGY”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1555515052205{padding-right: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”business-stretagy-txt”][vc_column_text]

Business Strategy

Did you know that 97% of your website traffic bounces off your website and only 1-3% visitors call you and leave their information by filling out the Web form. With new websites cropping up every day, this number keeps getting works.

Due to so many options and content available on the Internet, visitors stay on any website is not more than a few minutes. Therefore, all you have is the first few seconds to grab their attention.

Talk to every visitor right on your website, help them with what they are looking for. This is a tried and tested way to double your leads then get on the phone with the visitors before they even leave your website.

We specialize in 24/7 live chat outsourcing and providing resources that we train after understanding your requirements and business model. Our team will be as good as your own but big enough to greet every single visitor on your website 24/7[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1556301366218{padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.72) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}” el_class=”counter-column”][vc_column_text]

Check out our live leads counter to see how much business we have generated for our clients.

[/vc_column_text]
